Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0205 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-0205 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.3-4, affected by CVE-2019-0205
